title: Too Many Leaves
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 41 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: In this fall story, a young girl rakes leaves for her grandma, but there are Too Many Leaves. Early emergent readers will use repetitive sentence structures to guide them as they read a simple story with a fun ending. This book also provides the opportunity to teach about complete sentences and main idea and details.
meta: brown, gold, grandma, leaves, many, orange, rake, red, small
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /r/ sound
Complete Sentences : Analyze and create complete sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
